componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

My name is Bekie Berg, Retail & Advertising Product Manager at FLEXcon. Thank you for attending the Digital Output webinar regarding Floor Graphics for Smooth Surfaces on March 23rd.  I hope you found Jodi Sawyer’s presentation informative. 

Here's what you can expect from FLEXcon as a material supplier.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Jodi Sawyer
Strategic Business Unit Manager

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• Speak with someone who is familiar with your account
    • A dedicated, local Sales Representative who is responsible for your account.
    • A Customer Service Representative to support care of your day-to-day needs.
    • A Technical Service Representative to assist you with unique applications and assemble the necessary resources within FLEXcon to provide a solution.
  • Save time and money with pre-qualified products
  • Customize products if an off-the-shelf product won't suffice
  • Stay on top of trends, technical information and new products with our monthly newsletter.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Please reach out to me if you have any questions or would like to start a conversation.

{{{Sender.Signature}}}
